data.actual_result: it closes down the dev tools and scrolls the serverlist all the way to the top
data.expected_result: It should close the dev tools and not scroll the serverlist all the to the top
data.short_description: If you close down the chromium dev tool window, it will scroll your serverlist all the way to the top
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll down in your server list a bit - Open the chromium dev tools (CTRL + SHIFT + I) - Press the "x" to close it down
